title: Lifetime-A Snow Globe Christmas [2013]
description:
Lifetime-A Snow Globe Christmas (2013)

Air Date: 14 Dec 2013

Summary: While clasping her favorite Christmas snow globe, a cynical, overworked TV executive rants about how the movies she produces lie, making you think dreams come can come true. Upset, she tries to smash the globe, but instead it bonks her on the head, knocking her out. She wakes up in a perfect snow-covered town like the one in her globe. Here she is married to a handsome woodworker, and is the mother to two young kids. Everyone believes she's suffered memory loss from the concussion when she claims to not know where she is. But with the help of her snow globe family and her charming, yet enigmatic guardian angel, she begins to accept that this dream life may actually be real. But as her cynical, big city instincts begin to influence the town in a bad way, she has to decide if she really belongs this perfect snow globe life.

Cast: 

Alicia Witt ... Meg 
 
Alex Ball ... Poskins 
 
Diahnna Nicole Baxter ... Barb 
 
Logan Binstock ... Veronica / Mary 
 
Craig Blair ... Stevens 
 
Michael Bonnabel ... Carl

Dillon Daniel ... Joseph 
 
Neil Dickson ... Frank 
 
Trevor Donovan ... Eric 
 
Donald Faison ... Ted 
 
Hayden Faraday ... Teddy Jr. 
 
Tyler Griffin ... Stan
